name: LEGO® Star Wars™ III - The Clone Wars™

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/GOG Games/LEGO Star Wars - The Clone Wars/LEGOCloneWars.exe

content:
files:
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/GOG Games/LEGO Star Wars - The Clone Wars/LEGOCloneWars.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
